title: Frontend Intern
jdSnippet: We build modern user interfaces with React and follow Git workflows. Perfect opportunity for junior developers to grow in a collaborative environment with mentorship and hands-on experience in agile development.

title: Full Stack Developer
jdSnippet: Join our dynamic team to develop end-to-end web applications using modern JavaScript technologies. You'll work on both frontend React components and backend Node.js APIs while collaborating with cross-functional teams.

title: Backend Python Developer
jdSnippet: Build scalable backend systems and APIs using Python and Django. Work with databases, implement business logic, and ensure high performance and security in our enterprise applications.
